text: He double-crosses the five pals with whom he lives, cheats a waitress (Juliet Prowse) is too nice a chap to ring quite true as a smooth-tongued, ill-mannered Yank. His best moments are when he swings breezily into the title song.
handwritten_text: He double-crosses the five pals with whom he lives, cheats a waitress (Juliet Prowse) is too nice a chap to ring quite true as a smooth-tongued, ill-mannered Yank. His best moments are when he swings breezily into the title song.
